name: Lisa
description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius who was deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguised graduate in the past two centuries.

skillTalents.name: Lightning Touch
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Lôi DMG.
Trọng Kích
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Lôi DMG after a short casting time.
Nhảy Dậm
Gathering the might of Lôi, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Lôi DMG upon impact with the ground.

upgrades.name: Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Violet Arc
skillTalents.description:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.
Nhấn
Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Lôi DMG, and applies a stack of Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to enemies in a small AoE.
Nhấn Giữ
After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Lôi DMG to all nearby enemies.

Deals great amounts of extra damage to enemies based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.

skillTalents.name: Lightning Rose
skillTalents.description:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding enemies and dealing Lôi DMG.

The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back enemies and deal Lôi DMG for so long as it persists.

passiveTalents.name: Induced Aftershock
passiveTalents.description: Hits by Trọng Kíchs apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to enemies.

passiveTalents.name: Static Electricity Field
passiveTalents.description: Enemies hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passiveTalents.name: General Pharmaceutics
passiveTalents.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description:
Lisa recovers 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Lôimagnetic Field
constellations.description:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
Increases DEF by 25%.
Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

constellations.name: Lôicute
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby enemies.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.
